positions.market: Will 3 Fed rate cuts happen in 2025?

exitCriteria.notes: Hold to resolution - expect YES to reach 99%+ as Fed meeting confirms

positions.rationale: Testing momentum hypothesis on Fed market closing in 36h. Market has already priced in high probability, betting on continued momentum toward resolution.
High volume market ($351k/day). Testing if following volume signals works. Betting NO on ceasefire in remaining 23 days - seems rushed despite headlines.

exitCriteria.notes: Exit early if BTC surges past $130k

positions.rationale: BTC at ~$100k would need 50% gain in 23 days. While crypto is volatile, this seems overpriced. Testing conviction betting on clear probability assessments.

positions.market: Will NVIDIA be the largest company in the world by market cap on December 31?

exitCriteria.notes: Learning from AAPL loss - go with momentum not against

positions.rationale: NVDA already at 91%, testing momentum continuation. Our previous AAPL bet lost because we bet against momentum. Now testing WITH momentum.

tradeHistory.rationale: AAPL ($4.1-4.2T) only 5-7% behind NVDA ($4.44T). Market prices AAPL at 9% vs estimated 15-20% true probability. With 24 days to resolution, volatility could close gap. Testing hypothesis that multi-outcome markets misprice volatility in close races.

tradeHistory.reason: Thesis invalidated: Market cap gap widening not narrowing. NVDA pulling ahead. Price down 27% from entry with no reversal catalyst. Exiting to preserve capital.
